feed.title: La Grande Rivière - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande Rivière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -28.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 04:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -28.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -31.0°C
Wind: S 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
